## weightedAverage() function

Calculates the weighted average of a set of values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function weightedAverage<T>(weights: number[], values: T[], funcLerp: (a: T, b: T, w: number) => T): T;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

weights


</td><td>

number\[\]


</td><td>

An array of weights for each value.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

values


</td><td>

T\[\]


</td><td>

An array of values to be averaged.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

funcLerp


</td><td>

(a: T, b: T, w: number) =&gt; T


</td><td>

A function that performs linear interpolation between two values of type T.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T

The weighted average of the values.
